pullRequest.title: Make setting null-valued attributes a no-op, and document that their behavior is undefined.

nodes.bodyText: I don't think we use @Nonnull, we default to non-null. We're missing package-info.java to set ParametersNonNullByDefault but that's a better fix I think
should we check that we implement a no-op behavior instead of leaving it undefined?

commit.message: Make setting null-valued attributes a no-op, and document that their behavior is undefined.
also have the span itself ignore null attribute values
Set the non-null-by-default annotation on the package level for the common code.

afterCommit.message: Set the non-null-by-default annotation on the package level for the common code.

commit.message: add no-op validating tests with a caveat
